channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 追求 "美国活力"，安德森-霍洛维茨在华盛顿大展拳脚
item.description: Pursuing ‘American Dynamism,’ Andreessen Horowitz ups its game in DC trib.al/HQ6TJ1I

item.title: 花旗集团（Citigroup）分析师认为，Centrica 近期的股价暴跌 "似乎很残酷"。
item.description: Centrica’s recent share price slump "seems harsh," according to Citigroup analysts. trib.al/Gksz4uR

item.title: 瑞士 1 月份钟表出口小幅增长，原因是奢侈品市场持续放缓，买家对高昂的价格望而却步
item.description: Swiss watch exports rose modestly in January as the luxury slowdown persists and buyers balk at high prices trib.al/OEj3UGb

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯新成立的千亿美元投资公司将与软银在利雅得建立工业机器人工厂
item.description: Saudi Arabia’s new $100 billion investment firm to set up industrial robototics facility with Softbank in Riyadh trib.al/qMN8NtE

item.title: 巴克莱银行的助推器伦敦热潮
item.description: Barclays’ Booster: The London Rush trib.al/dKIttQY

item.title: 瑞典国防部长帕尔-琼森表示，瑞典将向乌克兰提供价值 6.8 亿美元的额外军事援助
item.description: Sweden will send $680 million worth of additional military aid to Ukraine, Defense Minister Pal Jonson says trib.al/MIodet6

item.title:
RT by @markets："我们非常非常看好英国的经商环境。
巴克莱银行首席执行官 C.S. Venkatakrishnan 说，英国在脱欧后 "显示出了自身的韧性"，并表示，"我们非常看好英国作为经商之地的前景"。
了解《今日市场》的最新信息：
item.description:
"We are very, very bullish on UK as a place to do business"

Barclays CEO C.S. Venkatakrishnan says the UK has "shown itself to be resilient" after Brexit and Covid

Get the latest with Markets Today: trib.al/SfovxKr

item.title: 由于诺和诺德公司和制药业同行扩大了生产规模，丹麦经济在第四季度迅速增长
item.description: Denmark’s economy expanded rapidly in the fourth quarter as Novo Nordisk and pharmaceutical peers ramped up production trib.al/tpFZim1

item.title: 马来西亚林吉特跌至 1998 年以来的最低水平
item.description: The Malaysian ringgit fell to its lowest level since 1998 trib.al/GTSrR3C

item.title:
RT by @markets：罗斯柴尔德家族的争斗、网络犯罪团伙的瓦解以及汽车竞争对手探索联合起来竞争电动汽车市场
收听《欧洲早间新闻》播客。
您的早间简报，您在 15 分钟内需要的商业新闻。
item.description:
The Rothschild clans do battle, a prolific cyber gang is disrupted and automotive rivals explore combining to compete in the EV market

Listen to The Daybreak Europe Podcast.

Your morning briefing, the business news you need in just 15 minutes.

omny.fm/shows/bloomberg-dayb…

item.title: 巴克莱银行表示，作为首席执行官文卡塔克里希南在未来几年将回报率提高到 12% 以上的努力的一部分，该公司将大力削减成本。
item.description: Barclays says it will go on a major cost-cutting drive as part of CEO Venkatakrishnan’s efforts to boost returns above 12% in the coming years trib.al/9Rg3yXj

item.title: 欧洲乘用车交付量上升，原因是大众和斯泰伦特等汽车制造商利用了积压订单，而且电动汽车的需求也有所恢复
item.description: Passenger-car deliveries in Europe rise as automakers like Volkswagen and Stellantis fed off order backlogs and demand for electric cars recovered trib.al/ty9ymKT

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所正在全球范围内为新生儿父母推出 26 周的带薪育儿假，超过了世界上一些最大的金融公司所提供的福利。
item.description: The London Stock Exchange is rolling out 26 weeks of paid parental leave for new parents globally, surpassing the benefit offered by some of the world’s biggest finance firms. trib.al/4I2u48x

item.title: 印度农民团体拒绝接受政府提出的保证某些农作物最低价格的提议，目前这些农作物的交易没有此类保障措施，预计他们将于周三恢复正在进行的抗议活动
item.description: Indian farmer groups reject a government offer to guarantee minimum prices for some crops currently traded with no such safeguard, and are expected to resume the ongoing protest on Wednesday trib.al/EKkFNnC

item.title: Colchester Global 正在加强对拉美债券的投资，同时继续回避中国债务--这一策略帮助其去年击败了 99% 的同行。
item.description: Colchester Global is beefing up its investment in Latin American bonds while continuing to sidestep Chinese debt — a formula that helped it beat 99% of its peers last year trib.al/4byeAW5

item.title: 以下是伦敦金融城及其他地区的最新新闻和见解
item.description: Here's the latest news and insights from the City of London and beyond trib.al/4fel0vk

item.title: 由于物流瓶颈限制了出口能力，英美资源集团的南非铁矿石部门提议进行重组，这可能会影响到约 490 个工作岗位
item.description: Anglo American’s South African iron ore unit proposes a reorganization that may affect about 490 jobs, as logistics bottlenecks limit its ability to export trib.al/kARXHrd

item.title: 在西澳大利亚一个关键地点的第二口天然气井流出水后，Strike Energy 的业绩下滑幅度为 2005 年以来最大，表明其产量可能低于预期
item.description: Strike Energy slid the most since 2005 after water flowed from a second natural gas well at a key site in Western Australia, indicating it may produce less than had been expected trib.al/sCnrW5x

item.title: 春节假期结束后，中国股市一直在苦苦挣扎。以下是自今年年初以来已宣布或报道的一系列拯救受创股市的措施
item.description: Chinese stocks have struggled for traction since returning from the Lunar New Year break. Here’s a list of measures that have either been announced or reported on since the start of the year to rescue its battered stock market trib.al/qRh7xwJ

item.title: 在欧洲开始新的一天需要知道的五件事
item.description: Five things you need to know to start your day in Europe trib.al/PFBzcMc

item.title: 行业领袖的求助，TikTok 面临正式调查，冯德莱恩寻求连任 等，尽在布鲁塞尔版
item.description: Industry leaders' cry for help, TikTok faces a formal probe, von der Leyen seeks a second term Those and more in the Brussels Edition trib.al/vE5ywM2

item.title: 中国股票交易者在结束一周长假返回后增加了保证金贷款，结束了数周的去杠杆化，这是市场情绪正在好转的一个潜在迹象
item.description: China stock traders boosted margin loans as they returned from the week-long holiday, ending weeks of deleveraging in a potential sign that sentiment is on the mend trib.al/s9QPtz7

item.title: 日本一位市长如何帮助扭转当地出生率下降的局面
item.description: How a mayor in Japan helped to turn around declining local birth rates trib.al/5dD3Yu6

item.title: 大型工业公司的负责人希望欧盟降低能源成本和绿色规则的监管负担，以帮助该地区在能源转型加速的过程中保持竞争力
item.description: The heads of major industrial companies want the EU to cut energy costs and the regulatory burden of green rules to help the region stay competitive as the energy transition accelerates trib.al/1w2G5YB

item.title: 罗马尼亚可能需要到本世纪末才能将预算赤字降至欧盟规定的目标，因为政府要在选举年应对公众对财政紧缩的抵触情绪
item.description: Romania may need until the end of the decade to bring its budget deficit down to a target set by EU rules as the government contends with public resistance to fiscal restraint in an election year trib.al/WG6mY2N

item.title: 从削减商业税到填补技能缺口的措施，以下是英国企业对下月预算的最大要求
item.description: From a cut in business taxes to measures to plug skills gap, here are the top requests UK firms have from next month's budget trib.al/KfmMTEv

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯证券交易所运营者称，外国投资者错失了优于大多数新兴市场同行的回报率
item.description: The operator of Saudi Arabia’s stock exchange says foreign investors are missing out on returns that have beaten most emerging-market peers trib.al/iYzLtA5

item.title: 纳瓦尔尼之死表明，俄罗斯经济为入侵乌克兰付出的代价还不足以建立威慑力，@johnauthers 说。
item.description: Navalny's death shows that the price paid by Russia's economy over the invasion of Ukraine hasn't been enough to establish deterrence, says @johnauthers trib.al/bEhgKYt

item.title: "汽车界的空中客车 "正在酝酿之中，以帮助欧洲汽车制造商与中国竞争，抵御生存威胁
item.description: An "Airbus of autos" is being floated to help Europe’s carmakers compete with China and fend off existential threats trib.al/rIEyyOu

item.title: RT by @markets：国际航空运输协会（International Air Transport Association）总干事威利-沃尔什（Willie Walsh）表示，中国商飞 C919 在新加坡航展上的展出 "令人激动"，但 "要想成为可信的全球参与者还需要一些时间"。
item.description: While it is “very exciting” to see China’s Comac C919 on display at the Singapore airshow, “it will take some time to establish themselves as a credible global player,” Willie Walsh, the director general of the International Air Transport Association says trib.al/xbK8O4X
